long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tools for ConnectWise Automate and Manage to improve productivity


ConnectWise Automate Enhancements:
-Time Sheet opens automatically when time entry opens
   Save time on needing to click through 5+ screens when accessing your time sheet. Paste your time sheet URL into the extension settings to automatically open it whenever the Create New Time Entry button is clicked on a ticket. 


ConnectWise Manage Enhancements:
-Custom Auto-Refresh Interval
    Prevent frequent auto-logout due to inactivity by having the page refresh itself automatically. 


Compatible with Chrome, Edge, and all chromium-based browsers.
